query.const: query Affiliations($name: String!){ affiliations(name: $name) { totalCount nextCursor items { id displayName uri } } }

query Licenses($term: String, $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ license(term: $term, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description } } }

query MetadataStandards($term: String, $keywords: [String!], $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ metadataStandards(term: $term, keywords: $keywords, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description keywords } } }

query Repositories($term: String, $keywords: [String!], $repositoryType: String, $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ repositories(term: $term, keywords: $keywords, repositoryType: $repositoryType, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description website keywords repositoryTypes } } }

help.default: Enter the title of this research output
Enter a brief description of this research output
Select the type of this research output
Mark all of the statements that are true about the dataset
Select the access level for this research output
The anticipated release date for the research output
The size of the research output in bytes
Select repository(ies) you would prefer users to deposit in

query.const: query Repositories($term: String, $keywords: [String!], $repositoryType: String, $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ repositories(term: $term, keywords: $keywords, repositoryType: $repositoryType, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description website keywords repositoryTypes } } }

help.default: Select metadata standard(s) you would prefer users to use

query.const: query MetadataStandards($term: String, $keywords: [String!], $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ metadataStandards(term: $term, keywords: $keywords, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description keywords } } }

help.default: Select the license you will apply to the research output

query.const: query Licenses($term: String, $paginationOptions: PaginationOptions){ license(term: $term, paginationOptions: $paginationOptions) { totalCount currentOffset limit hasNextPage hasPreviousPage availableSortFields items { id name uri description } } }

help.default: Explanation of what we expect the user to enter.
